short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display oyeti smart store orders, login with oyeti user id and password to receive realtime notifications for new orders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download the Smart Store App to take your business online and reach thousands of potential customers.

The Smart Store App not only enables you to manage and run your store more efficiently but also gives you total control over your business.

Manage and organise your store effectively. Helping you run your store
smartly, smoothly, and digitally.

Manage the pricing and availability of your products personally; run deals
and offers on your store as per your convenience. Run your store systematically and as per your wish to maximize profits.

Take total control over order fulfilment at your store. Accept or reject orders based on the availability of the product directly through the App.

Payment Information: Receive systematic and real-time record of all your online and offline payments. Stay aware of all the transactions happening at your store.

Get weekly transaction reports in the App. Keep a systematic record of all your transactions for reference. These reports are vital for analysing your online stores performance and developing strategies to improve business.
